name: InputMultiSelect
description: Multi-select input component with chip display for selected options

variants.name: default
variants.class: input-multi-select--default w-full p-2 text-gray-700 bg-white border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:outline-none focus:border-gray-400

variants.name: hover
variants.class: input-multi-select--hover w-full p-2 text-gray-700 bg-gray-50 border border-gray-400 rounded-md shadow-sm

variants.name: focus
variants.class: input-multi-select--focus w-full p-2 text-gray-700 bg-white border-2 border-blue-500 rounded-md shadow-sm outline-none ring-2 ring-blue-200

variants.name: active
variants.class: input-multi-select--active w-full p-2 text-gray-700 bg-white border-2 border-blue-600 rounded-md shadow-sm outline-none ring-2 ring-blue-300

variants.name: filled
variants.class: input-multi-select--filled w-full p-2 text-gray-900 bg-white border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm

variants.name: critical
variants.class: input-multi-select--critical w-full p-2 text-red-900 bg-white border-2 border-red-500 rounded-md shadow-sm ring-2 ring-red-200

variants.name: disabled
variants.class: input-multi-select--disabled w-full p-2 text-gray-400 bg-gray-100 border border-gray-200 rounded-md shadow-sm cursor-not-allowed
